channel.title: ... error

item.title: ... error
item.dc:creator: @twins twins
item.description:
@twins wrote:

this just jumped on the backround of the client…

if(aBoolean926) { aBoolean831 = false; g.setFont(new Font("Helvetica", 1, 16)); g.setColor(Color.yellow); int k = 35; g.drawString("Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading the HeroesLandScape client.", 30, k); k += 50; g.setColor(Color.white); g.drawString("To fix this try the following (in order):", 30, k); k += 50; g.setColor(Color.white); g.setFont(new Font("Helvetica", 1, 12)); g.drawString("1: Try closing ALL open web-browser windows, and reloading", 30, k); k += 30; g.drawString("2: Try clearing your web-browsers cache from tools->internet options", 30, k); k += 30; g.drawString("3: Try using a different game-world", 30, k); k += 30; g.drawString("4: Try rebooting your computer", 30, k); k += 30; g.drawString("5: Try selecting a different version of Java from the play-game menu", 30, k); }
